staff@oni.name: staff

It is a stout branch, perfect for a walking stick. Could be used as a staff
as well.
staff@oni.desc[0]: A long stout branch has fallen here.

sword2@oni.desc[1]: A short sword with a gem in the hilt lies on the ground.
sword2@oni.name: sword2
sword2@oni.examine:
This is a sword of true craftsmanship. Although it stands as tall as you in
height, it is as light as a normal sword. Its two edges are extremely sharp.
Just touching it causes your finger to bleed. The ruby like gem in the hilt
seems to be alive with the face of a demon.
sword2@oni.desc[2]: A long sword with a gem in the hilt lies here.
sword2@oni.desc[0]: A sword as tall as you with a gem in the hilt has been left here.

warningsign@oni.name: warningsign
warningsign@oni.examine:
W  NING! ! R v n  ah a .
The sign has worn down to the point that it is difficult to read.
warningsign@oni.desc[0]: A sign is nailed on to one of the trees.

walk across.

bulletin@oni.name: bulletin
bulletin@oni.examine:
Various notices are tacked onto the bulletin. One notice catches your
attention.

Welcome to Deufel, home of the Order of the White Phoenix. For those who have
never heard of the Order of the White Phoenix, they are an organization that
has protected the lands against demons since the beginning of written history.
Due to their efforts, demons are no longer a threat in this area. In fact, we
offer to any demon that is brave enough to enter to do so. As long as no harm
or wrong is done, demons are allowed within these town walls.

Interesting...especially in your current situation.
bulletin@oni.desc[0]: A bulletin is on the wall next to the gate.

notice@oni.name: notice
notice@oni.examine:
Remember, if you are planning to enter the portal be sure to have someone
waiting to let you out if necessary. There is no portal on the other side
unless someone is here to open it or Xergon is defeated. We of the Order
of the White Phoenix salute your bravery and wish you the best of luck.
notice@oni.desc[0]: A notice hangs next to the portal.

sword1@oni.desc[1]: A sword as tall as you floats above the water.
sword1@oni.name: sword1
sword1@oni.examine:
This is a sword of true craftsmanship. Although it stands as tall as you in
height, it is as light as a normal sword. Its two edges are extremely sharp.
Just touching it causes your finger to bleed. A sword of this quality surely
has been given a name, but alas it has probably been forgotten as has the
temple it had been found in.
sword1@oni.desc[2]: A sword as tall as you with a gem in the hilt has been left here.
sword1@oni.desc[0]: A sword as tall as you has been left here.

door1_in@oni.name: door1_in
door1_in@oni.examine:
The faces of the door have a carving on them. One depicts a large
battle axe. The other depicts a full suit of armor.
door1_in@oni.desc[0]: Two large metal temple doors are open.

note@oni.name: note
note@oni.examine:
legend
 o :: stump
 # :: plank

    o-o- - -o
    | | | | |
S o###o- -o-o
T   | | | # |
A    -o-o-#-o
R   | | | # |
T   o- -o-#- -o exit
    | | | # |
    o#o- -o-o
    
>From the crude drawing, you guess you have to get across using the planks.
But what is the catch?
note@oni.desc[0]: A note sits precariously at the edge of the room.

poem@oni.name: poem
poem@oni.examine:
Sent into the fire
Across the fire
Yearning the fire

Artificial in nature
Tested for nature

Away from the light
Loved by the light
Tormented by the light
Affected by the light
Rendered by the light

'oninoken'
poem@oni.desc[0]: A poem has been carelessly dropped here.

medallion@oni.desc[1]:
A gold medallion is caught on one of the rocks, you might be able to
reach for it as you pass by.
medallion@oni.name: medallion
medallion@oni.examine: It is a small gold medallion. Looks valuable.
medallion@oni.desc[0]: Someone has carelessly left a gold medallion on the floor.

statue2@oni.name: statue2
statue2@oni.examine:
The statue is indescribably ugly. Protruding out of its long snout like mouth 
are numerous canine like teeth. All that can be said about the rest of its 
face is that it is a malformed mass of flesh with two bead like eyes set into 
it. The rest of the statue is finished off with a large amount of armor. 
Probably a good thing.
statue2@oni.desc[0]: There is a hideous stone statue standing at attention in the corner.

the pit. It looks strong enough to support your weight and wide enough to

plank5b@oni.desc[0]: There is a large plank here.

notes@oni.name: notes
notes@oni.examine:
Reading through the notes explains the use of the gem. Apparently the gem is
a rarity known as a banishment gem. It can be used to banish a creature for
eternity to an empty plane. The Order of the White Phoenix had been collecting
them to use with a weapon to fight demons, but the project had turned out to
be a failure due to one of the side effects of the enchanted items. The gem
had never actually been tested with the sword though.
notes@oni.desc[0]: A pile of notes lies upon the altar.

armor@oni.desc[1]: A full plate of armor as dark as night floats above the water.
armor@oni.name: armor
armor@oni.examine:
Although the armor feels highly polished, it does not reflect any light,
giving it an eerie darkness to it. The large helmet molded in the shape of a
dragon's head, plus the large spikes that protrude from the shoulder plate
give the armor a sinister look. Giving it a quick test proves that it is
quite strong. The name of this armor has probably been long forgotten.
armor@oni.desc[0]: A full plate of armor as dark as night has been left here.

bushes@oni.desc[1]:
A group of large bushes blocks your path, but you can make out a small 
building to the north over the top.
bushes@oni.name: bushes
bushes@oni.examine:
You can see a small building to the north of the bushes. It looks like you
should be able to walk through without much harm.
bushes@oni.desc[0]:
Someone seems to have gone through the bushes ahead, clearing a path through
them. Looking through at the other side, you see a huge ravine, something you
missed while looking over the top of the bushes. Going north would not be a
good decision.

oni38@oni.title: Pillar over a dark pit
oni38@oni.description:
You are standing on top of a small pillar. The floor is actually quite a
distance below and actually appears to be moving!

oni4@oni.title: Dead End
oni4@oni.description:
Tall sheer cliff walls surround you, as you find yourself at a dead end.
Upon examining the walls, you find it impossible to climb. The cliff walls seem
to amplify the sound of the nearby rushing water, making it difficult to stay
here without covering your ears.

oni200@oni.title: Barracks
oni200@oni.description: The barracks of the Knights of the White Phoenix.

oni77@oni.title: Underground Passage
oni77@oni.description:
This almost forgotten secret passage was used by the Order of the White
Phoenix to bring wounded to the clerics at Deufel Temple. Now in the time of
peace, it has been pretty much forgotten about.

oni91@oni.title: Prison Cell
oni91@oni.description:
The prison cell is completely bare. Just the cold faces of the magically
fortified stone walls.

oni95@oni.title: Xergon's Prison Cell
oni95@oni.description:
The prison cell is completely bare. Just the cold faces of the magically
fortified stone walls. A pile of bones has been made near the spot where
the exit should be.

oni84@oni.title: North Wall of Deufel
oni84@oni.description:
The northern edge of Deufel is protected by a large wall with a heavy iron
portcullis allowing travelers to enter and exit. This gate is used most often
by the Knights of the White Phoenix, who have a compound to the north.

oni52@oni.title: Pillar over a dark pit
oni52@oni.description:
You are standing on top of a small pillar. The floor is actually quite a
distance below and actually appears to be moving!

oni5@oni.title: Hidden Forest Path
oni5@oni.description:
You are still on a hidden forest path. The path continues further into the
forest, but you cannot tell where it leads. The sound of rushing water is
getting quite loud, almost deafening in fact. Looking to the south, you see
nothing but trees and shrubs.

oni49@oni.title: Pillar over a dark pit
oni49@oni.description:
You are standing on top of a small pillar. The floor is actually quite a
distance below and actually appears to be moving!

oni85@oni.title: South Wall of Deufel
oni85@oni.description:
The southern edge of Deufel is protected by a large wall with a heavy iron
portcullis allowing travelers to enter and exit. This gate is used most often
by the Wizards of the White Phoenix, who have a compound to the south. Looking
around the compound, you find that it doesn't have any entrances. It looks like
they use magic to move around.

oni6@oni.title: Hidden Forest Path...still
oni6@oni.description:
Wait...you are no longer on the hidden forest path. Instead, you are
standing in mid-air over a ravine.

oni50@oni.title: Pillar over a dark pit
oni50@oni.description:
You are standing on top of a small pillar. The floor is actually quite a
distance below and actually appears to be moving!

oni47@oni.title: Pillar over a dark pit
oni47@oni.description:
You are standing on top of a small pillar. The floor is actually quite a
distance below and actually appears to be moving!

oni83@oni.title: Courtyard
oni83@oni.description:
The courtyard at the Knights of the White Phoenix's compound is a large
open area surrounded by high walls. The Knights use this area mainly for
training and ceremonies. Currently the courtyard is not being used for
any of those functions. The only apparent exit is to the south, back towards
the town.

oni60@oni.title: Underground Pond
oni60@oni.description:
Looking around, you find yourself in a underground pond directly below a
large circular opening in the ceiling. The pond isn't very deep and flows
out to the west.

oni29@oni.title: Main Temple Floor
oni29@oni.description:
You stand in the southeastern portion of the main temple floor. It is too
dark to see too much further in any of the other directions.

oni93@oni.title: Prison Cell
oni93@oni.description:
The prison cell is completely bare. Just the cold faces of the magically
fortified stone walls.

oni9@oni.title: Shore of a Calm River
oni9@oni.description:
You find yourself on the shore of small river. From your position you can
make out a tower jutting out of the forest to the north. There does not appear
to be a path to the north, but you see a well traveled path to the east. 
Looking across the river to the south, you cannot make out anything. The path
to the west appears to be flooded, and looks impassible at the time.

oni97@oni.title: Xergon's Prison Cell
oni97@oni.description:
The prison cell is completely bare. Just the cold faces of the magically
fortified stone walls.

oni68@oni.title: North Deufel
oni68@oni.description:
The area is populated mainly by blacksmiths, trainers, and other services
used by warriors. You can guess why, as to the north, outside the wall is a
huge castle like complex with a banner displaying a white phoenix.

oni59@oni.title: Pool
oni59@oni.description:
You are surprised to find that instead of sinking into the pool, you are 
able to stand on top of it as if it were solid rock. You find that you are 
able to walk around the pool without any problems.

oni74@oni.title: Deufel Temple
oni74@oni.description:
The interior of Deufel Temple is lit by large braziers placed at the
corners of the room. Also providing light are the large stain glass windows
depicting various events in the Order of the White Phoenix's history. A
small alcove to the south provides access to a staircase to the balcony
above and to the basement.

oni64@oni.title: East Deufel
oni64@oni.description:
The eastern portion of Deufel is known as the scholarly portion. Many of
its scholarly shops and places of interests are located within this section.
Two of the more prominent sites are the Deufel Library to the north and
Klink's Shop of Linguistics to the south.

oni36@oni.title: Small Room
oni36@oni.description:
You stand in a small room that seems to separate the main temple floor with
a small hallway to the west.

oni40@oni.title: Pillar over a dark pit
oni40@oni.description:
You are standing on top of a small pillar. The floor is actually quite a
distance below and actually appears to be moving!

oni8@oni.title: Roaring Rapids
oni8@oni.description:
You thrash about wildly as you are jostled around by the rapids. The current
is just too strong for you to fight. You watch helplessly as the river pushes
you towards a large grouping of rocks in the middle of the river.

oni75@oni.title: Deufel Temple Balcony
oni75@oni.description:
The balcony overlooking the main floor of Deufel Temple allows more people
to occupy the temple when needed.

oni99@oni.title: Xergon's Prison Cell
oni99@oni.description:
The prison cell is completely bare. Just the cold faces of the magically
fortified stone walls.

oni69@oni.title: South Deufel
oni69@oni.description:
The southern section of Deufel is known as the entertainment section. Many
artists, actors, singers and a variety of other entertainers have gathered
here to perform in theaters and on open air stages. The scene changes as you
go further south. A large castle like structure stands out to the south with
the banner of a white phoenix.

oni28@oni.title: Main Temple Floor
oni28@oni.description:
You stand in the southern portion of the main temple floor. To the south you
see the large temple doors, leading back to the outside, at the top of large
stone steps. It is too dark to see too much further in any of the other
directions.

oni101@oni.title: Basement
oni101@oni.description:
The basement of the Wizards' main tower is used mainly for experiments.
Most of the doors have been magically locked, but to the south is an alcove.

oni27@oni.title: Main Temple Floor
oni27@oni.description:
You stand in the southwestern portion of the main temple floor. It is too
dark to see too much further in any of the other directions.

oni1@oni.title: Hidden Forest Path
oni1@oni.description:
You are on a hidden forest path. The path continues further into the forest,
but you cannot tell where it leads. The sound of rushing water can be barely
made out. To the south you can still make out the main path.

oni16@oni.title: Forest
oni16@oni.description:
You are in a dense forest path. Very little light passes through the tall
canopy above, making it difficult to tell which way to go.

oni73@oni.title: Deufel Temple
oni73@oni.description:
When travelers first see Deufel Temple they are amazed at the beauty. Then
they wonder why it is not within the town walls. The clerics of Deufel Temple
have always felt that walls were not need to protect them. Their faith would
be enough to protection. Even so, the temple has been destroyed on multiple
occasions in the past, which results in the current, relatively new, temple.

oni70@oni.title: West Deufel
oni70@oni.description:
The west side of Deufel is mainly a residential area. Homes range from
small humble dwellings to large extravagant mansions.

oni98@oni.title: Xergon's Prison Cell
oni98@oni.description:
The prison cell is completely bare. Just the cold faces of the magically
fortified stone walls.

oni7@oni.title: Ravine
oni7@oni.description:
You try to peer further over the ravine edge. As you inch your way forward
you lose your balance and tumble forward toward the rapids below.

oni33@oni.title: Main Temple Floor
oni33@oni.description:
You stand in the northwestern portion of the main temple floor. It is too
dark to see too much further in any of the other directions.

oni15@oni.title: Forest
oni15@oni.description:
You are in a dense forest path. Very little light passes through the tall
canopy above, making it difficult to tell which way to go.

oni23@oni.title: Forest
oni23@oni.description:
Finally...an exit. Through the trees, you see an open clearing. At the
center of the clearing is a small stone building. From this distance you cannot
make out too much detail, except for that many of the walls have fallen and
become piles of rubble.

oni42@oni.title: Pillar over a dark pit
oni42@oni.description:
You are standing on top of a small pillar. The floor is actually quite a
distance below and actually appears to be moving!

oni14@oni.title: Forest
oni14@oni.description:
You are in a dense forest path. Very little light passes through the tall
canopy above, making it difficult to tell which way to go.

oni999@oni.title: Within the Gem
oni999@oni.description:
You find yourself within the crystal on the hilt of the nameless sword.
A magical place created to imprison a being for eternity...

oni58@oni.title: Pool - South
oni58@oni.description:
You stand at the south end of the large circular pool. Looking into the 
pool, you find that even with all the lights around you, the pool seems to 
fade into darkness. Floating above the center of the pool is a stand holding 
a full suit of armor so dark that it absorbs the light and a sword that 
appears to be sharp enough to cut through stone. Although the armor and sword 
is out of reach, you can probably swim to it without problems.

oni201@oni.title: Main Tower
oni201@oni.description:
The main tower of the Wizards of the White Phoenix is pretty empty. Most
of the important stuff are kept elsewhere.

oni65@oni.title: Deufel Library
oni65@oni.description:
What makes Deufel Library so special is that it houses the largest
collection of material related to demons and demon-kind. Much of the
information comes from books written by members of the Order of the White
Phoenix. The rest of the libraries collection isn't shabby either. There are
&+Gshelves&* upon shelves of books about various subjects on each of the nine
floors.

oni2@oni.title: Hidden Forest Path
oni2@oni.description:
You are on a hidden forest path. The path continues further into the forest,
but you cannot tell where it leads. The sound of rushing water is getting
louder. Looking back to the south, you try to make out the main path, but you
cannot find it in the abundance of shrubs and foliage.

oni76@oni.title: Deufel Temple Basement
oni76@oni.description:
The basement looks like it hasn't been used very often. Cobwebs cover just
about everything. There are a few set of tracks, but most of them lead to wine
barrels. One does stop in front of an empty portion of the east wall, but it
looks like they turn around right away.

oni19@oni.title: Forest
oni19@oni.description:
You are in a dense forest path. Very little light passes through the tall
canopy above, making it difficult to tell which way to go.

oni63@oni.title: East Wall of Deufel
oni63@oni.description:
The eastern edge of Deufel is protected by a large wall with a heavy iron
portcullis allowing travelers to enter and exit. Currently there are no
travelers entering or exiting the town, but guards are stationed nearby.

oni3@oni.title: Hidden Forest Path
oni3@oni.description:
You are on a hidden forest path. The path continues further into the forest,
but you cannot tell where it leads. The sound of rushing water is getting
louder. Looking back to the south, you try to make out the main path, but you
cannot find it in the abundance of shrubs and foliage. There is another path
heading east here as well.

oni90@oni.title: Prison Cell
oni90@oni.description:
The prison cell is completely bare. Just the cold faces of the magically
fortified stone walls.

oni11@oni.title: Path by a River
oni11@oni.description:
You are on an east-west path the follows the shores of a small river. The
area is surrounded by a lush forest with plants that you are unfamiliar with.
Amongst the trees you spot its various inhabitants, which you are equally
unfamiliar with. They appear harmless, as many of them quickly dart out of view
upon spotting you. As you look towards the north, the forest appears to grow
more dark and sinister.

oni79@oni.title: Underground Passage
oni79@oni.description:
This almost forgotten secret passage was used by the Order of the White
Phoenix to bring wounded to the clerics at Deufel Temple. Now in the time of
peace, it has been pretty much forgotten about. To the north is the Knight's
compound.

oni20@oni.title: Forest
oni20@oni.description:
You are in a dense forest path. Very little light passes through the tall
canopy above, making it difficult to tell which way to go.

oni34@oni.title: Main Temple Floor
oni34@oni.description:
You stand in the northern portion of the main temple floor. It is too dark
to see too much further in any of the other directions.

oni51@oni.title: Pillar over a dark pit
oni51@oni.description:
You are standing on top of a small pillar. The floor is actually quite a
distance below and actually appears to be moving!

oni32@oni.title: Main Temple Floor
oni32@oni.description:
You stand in the eastern portion of the main temple floor. It is too dark
to see too much further in any of the other directions.

oni102@oni.title: Altar Room
oni102@oni.description:
This room contains the &+Galtar&* used by the Wizards for their magical
experiments. It hasn't been used to often recently and has been gathering
dust.

oni72@oni.title: West Wall of Deufel
oni72@oni.description:
The western edge of Deufel is protected by a large wall with a heavy iron
portcullis allowing travelers to enter and exit. Currently there are a few
travelers entering and exiting the town.

oni44@oni.title: Pillar over a dark pit
oni44@oni.description:
You are standing on top of a small pillar. The floor is actually quite a
distance below and actually appears to be moving!

oni86@oni.title: Prison Hall - South
oni86@oni.description:
The prison consists of one long hallway with prison cells on either side.
Currently the southern half of the hallway holds the minor demons. These aren't
demons are weak though. Only compared to the other demons found further along
can these be considered weak.

oni61@oni.title: Underground Stream
oni61@oni.description:
The stream continues to flow west. Off in the distance is a point of light
that is probably the exit.

oni56@oni.title: South Hallway
oni56@oni.description:
The southern end of the hallway opens up to the east. The room to the east 
is ornately decorated. Torches shine down brightly on a huge pool in the center
of the room as well as the metal decorations. There appears to be something in
the middle of the pool, but the bright light makes it difficult to see clearly.

oni21@oni.title: Forest
oni21@oni.description:
You are in a dense forest path. Very little light passes through the tall
canopy above, making it difficult to tell which way to go.

oni18@oni.title: Forest
oni18@oni.description:
You are in a dense forest path. Very little light passes through the tall
canopy above, making it difficult to tell which way to go.

oni71@oni.title: Corrin's Home
oni71@oni.description: Corrin's home is pretty empty. Just a cot and a chair.

oni94@oni.title: Prison Cell
oni94@oni.description:
The prison cell is completely bare. Just the cold faces of the magically
fortified stone walls.

oni37@oni.title: Edge of Pit
oni37@oni.description:
You stand at the edge of a large pit with some pillars and planks
at various places.

oni13@oni.title: Forest Entrance
oni13@oni.description:
You stand near the entrance of the forest. To the south you can see the 
light of day. To the north you see nothing but trees and darkness. From the 
darkness you can make out glowing orbs, which appear to be staring directly 
at you.

oni10@oni.title: Path by a River
oni10@oni.description:
You are on an east-west path the follows the shores of a small river. The
area is surrounded by a lush forest with plants that you are unfamiliar with.
Amongst the trees you spot its various inhabitants, which you are equally
unfamiliar with. They appear harmless, as many of them quickly dart out of view
upon spotting you.

oni96@oni.title: Xergon's Prison Cell
oni96@oni.description:
The prison cell is completely bare. Just the cold faces of the magically
fortified stone walls.

oni55@oni.title: North Hallway
oni55@oni.description:
The northern end of the hallway opens up to the east. The room to the east 
is ornately decorated. Torches shine down brightly on a huge pool in the center
of the room as well as the metal decorations. There appears to be something in
the middle of the pool, but the bright light makes it difficult to see clearly.

oni67@oni.title: Deufel Square
oni67@oni.description:
The center of Deufel is occupied by an large fountain dedicated to the
Order of the White Phoenix. The fountain depicts the greatest moment in the
Order's history, the trapping of the arch-demon Xergon. From here four main
roads branch out to the north, east, south, and west.

oni24@oni.title: Forest Clearing
oni24@oni.description:
You stand in a clearing. Before you is what appears to be a very decrepit
shrine or temple of some forgotten culture. The high walls that surround the
shrine has started to crumble in some areas. Through the various gaps, you
see a one story building with four pillars at the corner. Each pillar is topped
with a different statue. The building and pillars appear to be in good shape,
unlike the wall that surrounds it. Even with this fact, it appears that this
place has been abandoned for quite some time.

oni89@oni.title: Prison Hall - Halfway
oni89@oni.description: The halfway point of the hallway is surrounded by medium threat demons.

oni87@oni.title: Prison Cell
oni87@oni.description:
The prison cell is completely bare. Just the cold faces of the magically
fortified stone walls.

oni22@oni.title: Forest
oni22@oni.description:
You are in a dense forest path. Very little light passes through the tall
canopy above, making it difficult to tell which way to go.

oni62@oni.title: East Shore
oni62@oni.description:
You find yourself at the eastern edge of a large lake. To the west is a
high sheer cliff with a small cave set into it. The lake is surrounded by
dense forests to the north and south. To the west is a large dirt road, which
heads towards a large wall.

oni103@oni.title: Hidden Room
oni103@oni.description:
You find yourself in a small room with a message carved into the walls.

The sword and gem together is not one but three.
   hikala hoei humae 
Only by the sword of a demon may they be called forth

oni54@oni.title: Small Hallway
oni54@oni.description:
The small hallway gives you a good view of the tall ceilings, but you cannot
see into the rest of the room. The ceiling shimmers from some unseen object.
It could possibly be some light reflecting off water. There doesn't appear to
be anything else of interest in this room. It is possible to go north or south
or back west to the staircase.

oni81@oni.title: Prison
oni81@oni.description:
The prison beneath the compound of the Knights of the White Phoenix holds
some of the most dangerous demons. It is even the home of Xergon, one of the
most feared in the land. In order to keep things in order, the Knights have
put in some precautions to prevent demons from escaping.

oni66@oni.title: Klink's Shop of Linguistics
oni66@oni.description:
The shop you have entered is located in a small alley that is well off the
main road. Even so, the shop is very crowded. Klink became famous after being
the first to be able to speak with demons in one of their own languages. Now
scholars from around the world come to learn from Klink.

oni92@oni.title: Prison Hall - North
oni92@oni.description:
The end of the long prison hallway. Here the high threat demons are kept.
At the very northern end is a portal leading to Xergon, the demon considered
the highest threat to the Order of the White Phoenix.

oni17@oni.title: Forest
oni17@oni.description:
You are in a dense forest path. Very little light passes through the tall
canopy above, making it difficult to tell which way to go.

oni31@oni.title: Main Temple Floor
oni31@oni.description:
You stand in the central portion of the main temple floor. It is too dark
to see too much further in any of the other directions.

oni46@oni.title: Pillar over a dark pit
oni46@oni.description:
You are standing on top of a small pillar. The floor is actually quite a
distance below and actually appears to be moving!

oni78@oni.title: Underground Intersection
oni78@oni.description:
Three underground passages intersect here. It is reasonable to assume that
the northern passage leads to the Knight's compound, the southern passage to
the Wizard's compound, and the western passage to Deufel Temple.

oni100@oni.title: Xergon's Prison Cell
oni100@oni.description:
The prison cell is completely bare. Just the cold faces of the magically
fortified stone walls.

oni35@oni.title: Main Temple Floor
oni35@oni.description:
You stand in the northeastern portion of the main temple floor. It is too
dark to see too much further in any of the other directions.

oni30@oni.title: Main Temple Floor
oni30@oni.description:
You stand in the western portion of the main temple floor. It is too dark
to see too much further in any of the other directions.

oni25@oni.title: Entrance to Temple
oni25@oni.description:
The shrine is in much better condition than the walls that surround it. In
fact the shrine appears to have suffered very little wear and tear. Intricate
carvings are etched into the walls depicting strange and hideous demons, making
you wonder what lies within.

oni48@oni.title: Pillar over a dark pit
oni48@oni.description:
You are standing on top of a small pillar. The floor is actually quite a
distance below and actually appears to be moving!

oni39@oni.title: Pillar over a dark pit
oni39@oni.description:
You are standing on top of a small pillar. The floor is actually quite a
distance below and actually appears to be moving!

oni53@oni.title: Edge of the Pit
oni53@oni.description:
You stand on the opposite side of the pit. A small stairway leads further
into the prison.

oni88@oni.title: Prison Cell
oni88@oni.description:
The prison cell is completely bare. Just the cold faces of the magically
fortified stone walls.

oni41@oni.title: Pillar over a dark pit
oni41@oni.description:
You are standing on top of a small pillar. The floor is actually quite a
distance below and actually appears to be moving!

oni57@oni.title: Pool - North
oni57@oni.description:
You stand at the north end of the large circular pool. Looking into the 
pool, you find that even with all the lights around you, the pool seems to 
fade into darkness. Floating above the center of the pool is a stand holding 
a full suit of armor so dark that it absorbs the light and a sword that 
appears to be sharp enough to cut through stone. Although the armor and sword 
is out of reach, you can probably swim to it without problems.

oni26@oni.title: Inside the Temple
oni26@oni.description:
The interior of the temple is larger then one would expect from the outside.
Large stone steps lead down to a large open area where much of the area is cast
in shadow created by the large chandelier hanging above. You catch glimpses of
movement, but it could be your imagination.

oni45@oni.title: Pillar over a dark pit
oni45@oni.description:
You are standing on top of a small pillar. The floor is actually quite a
distance below and actually appears to be moving!

oni80@oni.title: Underground Passage
oni80@oni.description:
This almost forgotten secret passage was used by the Order of the White
Phoenix to bring wounded to the clerics at Deufel Temple. Now in the time of
peace, it has been pretty much forgotten about. This part of the passage
leads to the Mage's compound to the south.

oni12@oni.title: Turn in the Path
oni12@oni.description:
The path turns away from the river and heads north. It looks like you will
have to enter the forest, which you cannot see more than 200 feet into, or head
back to the west.

oni82@oni.title: Main Chamber
oni82@oni.description:
The main chamber allows access to the other parts of the compound. Signs
show that to the east are the barracks, something you probably want to avoid.
Down some stairs to the east is the prison section. To the south is the
courtyard.

oni43@oni.title: Pillar over a dark pit
oni43@oni.description:
You are standing on top of a small pillar. The floor is actually quite a
distance below and actually appears to be moving!

knight1@oni.name: knight1
knight1@oni.examine:
Protected by a full suit of armor and a large shield and wielding a large
broadsword, the Knights of the White Phoenix are prepared to battle anything,
even a dangerous demon.
knight1@oni.description: A Knight of the White Phoenix prepares for battle!

statue2@oni.name: statue2
statue2@oni.examine:
This creature reminds you of one of the statues you saw in the hallway. 
Protruding out of its long snout like mouth are numerous canine like teeth.
All that can be said about the rest of its face is that it is a malformed 
mass of flesh with two bead like eyes set into it. Below the head he is 
covered in a thick armor.
statue2@oni.description: An ugly creature reminding you of a statue rushes towards you.

treefrog3@oni.name: treefrog3
treefrog3@oni.examine: This tree frog is quite large. It stares back at you with unblinking eyes.
treefrog3@oni.description: A large tree frog clings to a nearby tree.

wizard5@oni.name: wizard5
wizard5@oni.examine:
The Wizards of the White Phoenix have been trained to battle demons even
without the aid of their brethren knights. Their arsenal of attack spells
makes them very dangerous.
wizard5@oni.description: A Sorceress of the White Phoenix is beginning to cast a spell!

knight5@oni.name: knight5
knight5@oni.examine:
Protected by a full suit of armor and a large shield and wielding a large
broadsword, the Knights of the White Phoenix are prepared to battle anything,
even a dangerous demon.
knight5@oni.description: A Knight of the White Phoenix prepares for battle!

citizen3@oni.name: citizen3
citizen3@oni.examine: The citizen quickens her pace as you look at her.

chipmunk@oni.name: chipmunk
chipmunk@oni.description: A cute little chipmunk stares intently at you.

xergon@oni.name: xergon
xergon@oni.examine:
Years of imprisonment has caused Xergon's rage to build up to a point that
he now blindly attacks anything that moves near him. He does so in a berserker
like rage that makes him a terrifying opponent.
xergon@oni.description: Xergon the arch-demon stares cruelly at you.

citizen1@oni.name: citizen1
citizen1@oni.examine: As you stare at the citizen, he gives you a sneer and continues on.

knight4@oni.name: knight4
knight4@oni.examine:
Protected by a full suit of armor and a large shield and wielding a large
broadsword, the Knights of the White Phoenix are prepared to battle anything,
even a dangerous demon.
knight4@oni.description: A Knight of the White Phoenix prepares for battle!

statue1@oni.name: statue1
statue1@oni.examine:
This creature reminds you of one of the statues you saw in the hallway. 
Protruding out of its long snout like mouth are numerous canine like teeth. 
All that can be said about the rest of its face is that it is a malformed 
mass of flesh with two bead like eyes set into it. Below the head he is 
covered in a thick armor.
statue1@oni.description: An ugly creature reminding you of a statue rushes towards you.

spider@oni.name: spider
spider@oni.examine: The large spider stares back at you with its many unmoving eyes.
spider@oni.description: A large black spider hangs from the ceiling.

wizard6@oni.name: wizard6
wizard6@oni.examine:
The Wizards of the White Phoenix have been trained to battle demons even
without the aid of their brethren knights. Their arsenal of attack spells
makes them very dangerous.
wizard6@oni.description: A Wizard of the White Phoenix is beginning to cast a spell!

demon1@oni.name: demon1
demon1@oni.examine:
This minor demon isn't very tough. But when it is attacked it teleports
to escape.
demon1@oni.description: A minor demon quickly sees you!

corrin@oni.name: corrin
corrin@oni.examine: Corrin stares at you through squinted eyes.
corrin@oni.description: A odd person stands next to building with the sign 'Corrin's Home'

klink@oni.name: klink
klink@oni.examine:
Klink sits behind the counter reading a large tome. He answers any customer
questions or sales, but promptly returns to reading.
klink@oni.description: The owner, Klink, is behind the counter.

wizard1@oni.name: wizard1
wizard1@oni.examine:
The Wizards of the White Phoenix have been trained to battle demons even
without the aid of their brethren knights. Their arsenal of attack spells
makes them very dangerous.
wizard1@oni.description: A Sorceress of the White Phoenix is beginning to cast a spell!

citizen2@oni.name: citizen2
citizen2@oni.examine: As you stare at the citizen, he tries to avoid your eyes.

demon3@oni.name: demon3
demon3@oni.examine:
The demon is of immense size and has a hardened shell that protects it from
most physical damage and magical damage. Luckily it's too slow to do any
real damage.
demon3@oni.description: A medium threat demon sits here unmoving.

citizen4@oni.name: citizen4
citizen4@oni.examine: As you stare at the citizen, she gives you a sneer and continues on.

treefrog1@oni.name: treefrog1
treefrog1@oni.examine: This tree frog is quite large. It stares back at you with unblinking eyes.
treefrog1@oni.description: A very large tree frog clings to a nearby tree.

wizard2@oni.name: wizard2
wizard2@oni.examine:
The Wizards of the White Phoenix have been trained to battle demons even
without the aid of their brethren knights. Their arsenal of attack spells
makes them very dangerous.
wizard2@oni.description: A Wizard of the White Phoenix is beginning to cast a spell!

demon2@oni.name: demon2
demon2@oni.examine:
This medium demon is difficult to kill because of it immunity to
magic and its ability to weaken its victim in experience.
demon2@oni.description: A medium threat demon charges at you!

knight2@oni.name: knight2
knight2@oni.examine:
Protected by a full suit of armor and a large shield and wielding a large
broadsword, the Knights of the White Phoenix are prepared to battle anything,
even a dangerous demon.
knight2@oni.description: A Knight of the White Phoenix prepares for battle!

wizard4@oni.name: wizard4
wizard4@oni.examine:
The Wizards of the White Phoenix have been trained to battle demons even
without the aid of their brethren knights. Their arsenal of attack spells
makes them very dangerous.
wizard4@oni.description: A Wizard of the White Phoenix is beginning to cast a spell!

demon4@oni.name: demon4
demon4@oni.examine:
The demon has trapped you within its own body.  It doesn't look like there
is anyway to escape except to hack through it.
demon4@oni.description: A high threat demon appears before you and surrounds you with its body.

ghoul2@oni.name: ghoul2
ghoul2@oni.examine:
Pieces of flesh hang from multiple places, providing you with an indecent 
view of the ghoul's internals.
ghoul2@oni.description: The decaying carcass of a ghoul makes its way across the room.

ghoul1@oni.name: ghoul1
ghoul1@oni.examine:
